abstract: Meagan Duhamel and Eric Radford of Canada win pairs gold medal at figure skating world championships in Shanghai.
lead_paragraph: The Canadian duo Meagan Duhamel and Eric Radford held off two Chinese teams in the free skate to capture the gold medal in pairs at the world championships in Shanghai.
snippet: The Canadian duo Meagan Duhamel and Eric Radford held off two Chinese teams in the free skate to capture the gold medal in pairs at the world championships in Shanghai.
